examples.example: 期待着我们下一次见面时能一起分享更多的快乐。

translate.english: Looking forward to sharing more happiness together when we meet next time.

examples.example: 朋友间总是期待每一次见面都能带来无尽的欢乐。

translate.english: Friends always expect that every meeting can bring endless joy.

examples.example: 我和许久未见的老友约定下次见面一定要好好聊聊。

translate.english: I made an appointment with an old friend whom I haven't seen for a long time that we must have a good chat next time we meet.
